availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Nelson County, Kentucky, carpenter. Kentucky native. Married to Martha Whalen on December 17, 1856. Father of Eugene Blanford, John Blanford, Annie Blanford, and Charles Blanford. Carpenter in Nelson County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Nelson County, District 2, Bardstown, p. 3.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Nelson County, Bardstown, p. 62A.
Kentucky, County Marriage Records, 1783-1965, Kentucky, Nelson County, Film # 000481488, December 17, 1856 (accessed via ancestry.com).
